lines.text: You don't have any weapons in there, do you?
I'm glad you asked me twice. You see I'm a bilingual. A bilingual illiterate - I can't read in two languages.
The stranger has been known to masquerade as a priest wearing high heeled shoes.
I'm just tired... I've been up all night trying to round off the infinate. And Lucifer before the day doth go.
I don't know. I used to be blind. But then I started eating carrots. I still can't see during the day.
